product_name: AMC AMC Discover Acadia National Park - 3rd Edition
long_description: AMC's Discover Acadia National Park includes the 50 best hiking, biking and paddling trips in New England's only national park and offers options for adventurers of all ability levels.
short_description: AMC's Discover Acadia National Park includes the 50 best hiking, biking and paddling trips in New England's only national park and offers options for adventurers of all ability levels.
